name: Ultimate Snowman Builder
description:
It is winter, and you want to build the ultimate snowman!

Roll down a mountain to build the body-parts that you need. Try to make the child happy by crashing into the suggested character. You do not want a bad snowman.

Made for GMTK Game Jam 2021.

PS: I heard something special might happen if the ball gets big enough!

Credits:

https://satyre.newgrounds.com/
